Article Title: Abhishek Sharma goes berserk: 12-ball fifty, 32-ball hundred as he shatters multiple T20 records
Article Text:
Abhishek Sharma (Photo by Chris Hyde/Getty Images)

A 12-ball fifty with 50 runs in boundaries

How Ajit Agarkar is letting Indian cricket down

Equals Rohit Sharma; only Virat Kohli ahead

Breaks his own six-hitting record

Most T20 sixes by an Indian in a calendar year

91* (33 innings) ‚Äì Abhishek Sharma (2025)





(33 innings) ‚Äì Abhishek Sharma (2025) 87 (38 innings) ‚Äì Abhishek Sharma (2024)





85 (41 innings) ‚Äì Suryakumar Yadav (2022)





(2022) 71 (33 innings) ‚Äì Suryakumar Yadav (2023)





66 (31 innings) ‚Äì Rishabh Pant (2018)





63 (42 innings) ‚Äì Shreyas Iyer (2019)





60 (32 innings) ‚Äì Sanju Samson (2024)





Punjab cross the 300-run mark

After enduring a series of low scores on his comeback to the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy as Punjab ‚Äôs captain, Abhishek Sharma produced a breathtaking counterattack on Sunday morning, hammering a record-breaking century against a seasoned Bengal bowling attack at the Gymkhana Ground in Hyderabad.Sent out to open after Punjab opted to bat first, Abhishek found rhythm immediately. He blasted his way to a half-century in just 12 deliveries, launching into his former SunRisers Hyderabad teammate Mohammed Shami for 23 runs in a single over.The scale of the assault was astonishing. By the time he reached his fifty, the left-hander had scored 50 of his first 51 runs in boundaries, smashing five sixes and five fours to leave Bengal stunned.Alongside him, Prabhsimran Singh also fired up early, helping Punjab surge past 120 inside eight overs. Abhishek continued to muscle sixes straight down the ground, repeatedly targeting the V region with brutal precision.The carnage didn‚Äôt stop. Abhishek stormed to a century in 32 balls, finishing with 11 sixes and seven fours before reaching triple figures. This knock marked his eighth T20 hundred in 157 innings, bringing him level with Rohit Sharma.Among Indian batters, only Virat Kohli (nine) has more T20 centuries.Just last season, Abhishek smashed a 28-ball hundred against Meghalaya, the joint-fastest by any Indian in T20 cricket. He also struck 87 sixes in T20s in 2024, the most by an Indian man in a single year.With 16 sixes in this innings alone, Abhishek went past his 2024 tally, becoming the first Indian to cross 90 T20 sixes in a calendar year.Abhishek eventually departed for a spectacular 148 off 52 balls, with 16 sixes and eight fours, but not before powering Punjab to a score beyond 300. They have now become only the second Indian T20 side, after Baroda against Sikkim in 2024, to breach the 300-run barrier.
Article Summary: Abhishek sharma smashes a record-breaking century for punjab. The 25-year-old hit 16 sixes and eight fours in his 148 off 52 balls. It was his eighth t20 hundred in 157 innings, level with rohit sharma. Only virat kohli (nine) has more t20 centuries.

Article Title: Smriti Mandhana, Palash Muchhal update their Instagram bio after wedding postponed
Article Text:
Smriti Mandhana and Palash Muchhal

Palash Muchhal-Smriti Mandhana Wedding Row - New Twist?

Indian women's cricket star Smriti Mandhana and music composer Palash Muchhal 's wedding, scheduled for November 23, has been postponed due to unexpected health emergencies.The postponement came after Mandhana's father, Shriniwas, fell ill on the wedding day and required hospitalization. The following day, Palash Muchhal was also admitted to a hospital in Sangli, Mandhana's hometown, before being transferred to Mumbai for treatment.The wedding delay was officially announced by Mandhana's manager, citing the health emergencies as the reason for the postponement.Following the postponement, Mandhana removed all wedding-related posts from her Instagram account, though some casual photographs with Palash remain visible. Both Shriniwas and Palash have since been discharged from the hospital, but the families have not yet announced a new wedding date.Social media users have noticed that both Mandhana and Muchhal have updated their Instagram bios with the 'nazar' (evil eye) emoticon, sparking further discussion about the situation.Family members from both sides have emphasised that the wedding's postponement is solely due to the health emergencies that occurred.In a show of support, Team India player Jemimah Rodrigues has withdrawn from the Women's Big Bash League (WBBL) to be with Mandhana during this challenging time.The postponement comes just weeks after India's victory in the Women's World Cup , where Mandhana played a crucial role in the team's success.Palash's mother, Amita, remains optimistic about the wedding taking place in the near future."Smriti and Palash dono takleef mein hain... Palash dreamt of coming home with his bride. I had even planned a special welcome... Everything will be fine, shaadi bohot jaldi hogi," she told Hindustan Times.The situation has garnered significant attention, particularly given Mandhana's status as one of India's premier cricketers and Muchhal's reputation in the music industry.Both families are currently focused on the recovery of their loved ones, while supporters and fans await news of the rescheduled wedding date.The unexpected health issues have affected what was anticipated to be a high-profile celebration, bringing together two prominent personalities from the worlds of sports and entertainment.The timing of the postponement, following India's World Cup triumph, has added to the public interest in the situation, with both Mandhana and Muchhal receiving support from their respective professional communities.Despite the current circumstances, both families maintain a positive outlook regarding the future celebration of the union between the cricketer and the music composer.
Article Summary: Smriti mandhana and palash muchhal's wedding has been postponed. The postponement comes after the cricketer's father fell ill on the wedding day. The following day, muchhal was also admitted to a hospital for treatment. Both families have not yet announced a new wedding date.

Article Title: Sangai Festival 2025: India B (Manipur) beats Colombia 8-5 to win the 15th Manipur Polo International Tournament
Article Text:
Kashi Tamil Sangamam 4.0: 300 Varanasi Students To Visit Tamil Nadu As Centre Expands Tamil Outreach

India B (Manipur) clinched a spectacular victory over Colombia with a score of 8‚Äì5 in a thrilling final to lift the coveted title at the 15th Manipur Polo International Tournament. The championship match, held on Saturday at the Imphal Polo Ground, drew the curtains over the week-long sporting spectacle.The tournament, organised by the Manipur horse riding and polo association, was held from November 22 to 29 and was one of the major draws of the ongoing 10-day Sangai Festival 2025, which concludes today.The venue, the Imphal polo ground, also known as Mapal Kangjeibung, is widely known as one of the oldest polo grounds in the world, adding heritage value to the event.Manipur governor Ajay Kumar Bhalla attended the high-octane finale along with his wife Jyoti Grover Bhalla. They participated in the closing ceremony as well. The final match commenced with a ceremonial throw-in of the polo ball by the governor, signalling the official start of play. During the closing ceremony, he also released the official souvenir of the tournament.The presence of international teams further elevated the competition of this year‚Äôs championship, reinforcing Manipur‚Äôs deep and historic connection with equestrian sports.The state is often celebrated as the birthplace of modern-day polo and the tournament is testimony to Manipur‚Äôs longstanding association with the sport.Governor Bhalla presented medals to both the champions and runners-up. The winning team, India B (Manipur), was awarded a cash prize of Rs 2 lakh, while team Colombia took home a prize money of Rs 1.5 lakh. After the prizes were distributed, Bhalla formally declared the tournament closed.The final match also saw the presence of the President of the Manipur Pony Society, alongside other members of the public.
Article Summary: India b (manipur) clinched a spectacular victory over colombia with a score of 8‚Äì5 in a thrilling final to lift the coveted title. The tournament, organised by the manipur horse riding and polo association, was held from november 22 to 29 and was one of the major draws of the ongoing 10-day sangai festival 2025.

Article Title: Bo Bichette contract talks hit another pause after analysts explain major risks facing the Toronto Blue Jays
Article Text:
Bo Bichette contract talks hit another pause after analysts explain major risks facing the Toronto Blue Jays (Image Via Getty)

Bo Bichette‚Äôs injuries spark big concern as MLB analysts explain Blue Jays‚Äô slow approach

Bo Bichette is in the news again as MLB analysts wonder why the Toronto Blue Jays have still not re-signed him. The questions grew louder this week when the team signed starting pitcher Dylan Cease to a seven-year, two hundred and ten million dollar deal. Many fans thought the team would sign Bo Bichette first because he is one of their top players. Instead, the Blue Jays chose to move fast with Dylan Cease, and that raised doubts.On Thursday, Jeff O‚ÄôNeill, Bryan Hayes and Dave Feschuk spoke about this on TSN‚Äôs ‚ÄúOverdrive‚Äù show from Toronto. They said the delay with Bo Bichette may show that the team has concerns. They also said there could be ‚Äúred flags‚Äù that the Blue Jays are thinking about before offering a long contract.Bryan Hayes said the Toronto Blue Jays may still be trying to understand Bo Bichette‚Äôs true market value. He explained that the team did not need to study Dylan Cease‚Äôs price because many teams were already ready to offer him big money.But with Bo Bichette, he said the team may be unsure about the right number. He added that Bo Bichette may also believe he should get top pay, but that does not always match what a team wants to spend.Dave Feschuk then spoke about Bo Bichette‚Äôs injury issues. He said these injuries cannot be ignored.He explained that Bo Bichette was not healthy for most of the playoffs last year. He also said that the shortstop missed a large part of the 2024 season when the Blue Jays finished last in the American League East. Dave Feschuk said these things matter because teams think carefully before giving a long contract that covers many years.Bo Bichette missed eighty-one games in the 2024 season. His injuries included right knee tendonitis, a right quad strain and a right calf strain. He missed the final month of the regular season while he was leading MLB in hits. He returned only for the World Series.Dave Feschuk also said teams may be more careful with money because the next Collective Bargaining Agreement talks will happen after the 2026 season.He said some teams believe a salary cap could arrive, so they do not want to spend too much before the MLB rules change. Bo Bichette has been a career point two nine four hitter with one hundred eleven home runs and four hundred thirty-seven RBIs. His hitting numbers remain strong, but teams must decide how his injuries will affect his future deals.Also Read: San Francisco Giants Jump Ahead Of $8.2B New York Yankees In Rising Race For Tatsuya Imai
Article Summary: Toronto blue jays signed starting pitcher dylan cease to a seven-year, two hundred and ten million dollar deal this week. Many fans thought the team would sign bo bichette first because he is one of their top players. Mlb analysts explain blue jays‚Äô slow approach to re-signing him on tsn‚Äôs ‚Äúoverdrive‚Äù show.

Article Title: IND vs SA: Virat Kohli says no, Rohit Sharma walks: DRS moment steals spotlight during IND vs SA 1st ODI
Article Text:
Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma (screengrabs)

Inside India nets in Ranchi: How Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma prepared for first ODI vs South Africa

Former India skipper Rohit Sharma ‚Äôs fluent half-century came to an abrupt end on Sunday after a brief mid-pitch consultation with Virat Kohli led to the opener deciding against reviewing an LBW decision, a call that left fans buzzing across social media during the first ODI against South Africa.The moment unfolded in the 22nd over of the Indian innings.Marco Jansen went short of a length, the ball stayed lower than expected and struck Rohit around the back thigh as he swivelled into a pull shot.The Proteas went up immediately, the umpire raised the finger, and Rohit paused, turning to non-striker Kohli for a quick word.After a few seconds of discussion, the two agreed there was no need for DRS.Rohit began the walk back, ending what had been a composed, commanding outing. Replays later suggested the delivery would have clipped the top of the stumps at worst, validating the decision to move on.Rohit departed for 57 off 50 balls, hitting five fours and three sixes, and in the process rewriting ODI history.Earlier in his innings, the 38-year-old had sent two clean hits sailing over deep midwicket off spinner Prenelan Subrayen to draw level with Shahid Afridi‚Äôs tally of 351 sixes, the previous record for most in One-Day Internationals.Moments later, a towering pull off Jansen over deep square leg carried him past the former Pakistan star.With 352 ODI sixes, Rohit is now the most prolific six-hitter the format has ever seen, achieving the feat in just 270 innings, far quicker than Afridi‚Äôs 398-match career.He also brought up his 60th ODI half-century before his exit, extending a legacy built since his debut in 2007.
Article Summary: Rohit sharma's fluent half-century came to an abrupt end after a brief mid-pitch consultation with virat kohli led to the opener deciding against reviewing an lbw decision. The moment unfolded in the 22nd over of the indian innings. Rohit departed for 57 off 50 balls, hitting five fours and three sixes.

Article Title: Leon Draisaitl breaks silence with sharp message that puts new spotlight on Connor McDavid leadership
Article Text:
Leon Draisaitl breaks silence with icy message that puts new spotlight on Connor McDavid leadership (Image via Getty)

Leon Draisaitl and Connor McDavid still carry the Oilers‚Äô offense

Leon Draisaitl made news when he gave a short and cold answer to people talking about the Edmonton Oilers‚Äô leadership. A podcast online said the team‚Äôs top players, like Leon Draisaitl and captain Connor McDavid, were not showing enough strong direction when the team struggled. The video spread fast, and many fans talked about it. When Leon Draisaitl saw the clip, he replied with just one word: ‚ÄúLol.‚Äù His reply was simple, but it got a lot of likes and showed he did not agree with the talk about weak leadership.The podcast hosts said the team‚Äôs main leaders should be the ones pulling everyone together during tough nights. They felt the Edmonton Oilers still leaned too much on older veteran players for guidance. They also said Draisaitl and McDavid are now older and should not need as much help. This started a big discussion because both players have already led the Oilers to long playoff runs.The Oilers reached the Stanley Cup Final in both 2024 and 2025. Connor McDavid played a huge role and won major awards. Leon Draisaitl also had strong numbers and scored many big points. They were the two players who pushed the team forward each year.Because of this, some fans feel the criticism is unfair, while others think it is needed for the team to grow.But even with their talent, this season has not been smooth. The Oilers have been up and down. They have wins and losses that keep them in the middle. Their offense still shines because of Connor McDavid and Leon Draisaitl, who both continue to score and make plays. But the team‚Äôs biggest problem is still on defense. They give up too many goals, and the goalies face too much pressure each night. This hurts their chances to move up in the standings.Connor McDavid has many points this season and still drives the attack every game. Leon Draisaitl also has strong numbers and helps the team stay in games. Their power play is strong, and they create many chances. But offense alone cannot fix everything. The team needs better defense and better support if they want to reach the Stanley Cup Final again.Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs ‚ÄúLol‚Äù reply showed he is not worried about outside noise. Now fans wait to see how the Oilers respond on the ice, where leadership matters the most.Also Read: NHL Injury Update: Ryan Nugent-Hopkins Returns, While Kaapo Kakko And William Nylander Remain Questionable
Article Summary: Leon draisaitl made news when he gave a short and cold answer to people talking about the edmonton oilers‚Äô leadership. A podcast online said the team‚Äôs top players, like leon draisaitl and captain connor mcdavid, were not showing enough strong direction when the team struggled.

Article Title: Travis Kelce hypes up Shedeur Sanders after standout Browns performance, fueling excitement around rising NFL star
Article Text:
Travis Kelce reacts to Shedeur Sanders‚Äô Browns debut (Getty Images)

Travis Kelce sent a resounding message on Browns rookie Shedeur Sanders



Cleveland finally felt a long awaited spark when Shedeur Sanders stepped onto the field for his first NFL start. The Browns needed someone to steady an offense that had been stuck for most of the season, and Sanders delivered a performance that shifted the mood in the city. His debut not only brought a win but also caught the attention of two of Cleveland‚Äôs most accomplished sons, Jason and Travis Kelce . Their excitement set the tone for a conversation that echoed across the league.Travis Kelce did not hide how thrilled he was. He sent a strong message to Sanders on the latest episode of New Heights, praising the rookie with all the energy fans expect from him. ‚ÄúTalk your sh**, Shedeur, let‚Äôs f**ing go. My dog goes in, gets his first start, gets his first dub. Let‚Äôs f*cking go, man. The 45th starting QB for the Browns since 1994. First Browns QB to win in his first official start since 1995. Cleveland‚Äôs been waiting for this. We‚Äôve been waiting for this,‚Äù Travis said.For Travis, this moment carried extra meaning. He grew up in Cleveland, starred at the University of Cincinnati and has always kept a place in his heart for the Browns. Seeing Sanders command the offense and lead a 24 to 10 victory over the Raiders reminded him of what the city has been longing for. Jason Kelce agreed, saying Sanders brought something that had been missing. ‚ÄúIn one game, Shedeur showed them more than they had seen, really, in any of the games with Gabriel,‚Äù he said.Jason noted that Sanders was not perfect, but his poise and timely throws stood out.Sanders went 11 for 20 for 209 yards with one touchdown and one interception. His best throw came on a play where Las Vegas brought heavy pressure. Instead of folding, he rolled right and sent a 52 yard strike to Isaiah Bond. His touchdown came later when rookie Dylan Sampson turned a screen into a 66 yard score. It was the type of play Cleveland had been desperate to see.A week earlier, Sanders struggled in relief duty. He entered cold and completed only four passes against Baltimore. This time he had preparation, rhythm and confidence. Now he faces a much tougher test when the Browns meet the 49ers. With the Kelce brothers and the city behind him, Sanders steps into Week 13 with belief and momentum on his side.Also Read: Meet Taylor Burr, the Chiefs‚Äô breakout sideline personality who‚Äôs living her dream and charming viewers nationwide
Article Summary: Shedeur sanders made his debut for the browns against the raiders. Travis kelce and jason kelce praised the rookie quarterback on new heights. Sanders is the 45th starting qb for the cleveland browns since 1994. He is the first browns qb to win in his first official start since 1995.

Article Title: Dallas Mavericks star rookie Cooper Flagg leaves behind LeBron James with a rare NBA record
Article Text:
Cooper Flagg (Image via Getty)

Dallas Mavericks‚Äô star rookie Cooper Flagg creates a rare NBA record against the Los Angeles Clippers

Cooper Flagg, Klay Thompson, & Jason Kidd | Media Availability @ LAC | 11/29/25

Dallas Mavericks popular rookie Cooper Flagg has been generating waves in the league ever since he was drafted. He has been turning heads with his great dunking skills after officially becoming a part of the NBA. Recently, Flagg went on to leave behind Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô cornerstone LeBron James with a rare NBA record.Reportedly, Cooper Flagg became the youngest basketball athlete to score 35 points during a recent game against the Los Angeles Clippers. After fishing out 11 assists and losing an intense game against the Lakers, Flagg went on to create history with an overall score of 114-110 against the Clippers at Intuit Dome.Cooper Flagg recently turned heads in the NBA world with his phenomenal athletic prowess. The Mavericks star rookie went on to secure 35 points after defeating the Clippers in a recent game. LeBron James is the only other 18-year-old to score 35 points in an NBA game. He did it twice as a rookie in December 2023. His first 35-point game came when he was 18 years and 348 days old, which is five days older than Flagg was on Saturday. During the postgame conference, Dallas Mavericks‚Äô coach Jason Kidd said,"He's only 18 years old, but he seems like he's been in this league before.He did it all tonight. He had the ball. You can call it point guard or whatever, but he ran the offense for us. He drove the ball. The ball touched the paint. He got to the rim, got to the free throw line, stepped up and made free throws for us late. Just his composure on both ends [was impressive]. He competes at a very high level. You saw that tonight, but you saw that last night, too. "Flagg had struggled in the second game of past back-to-backs, but this time he started strong with 12 points in the first quarter and 21 by halftime. He finished well too, staying composed after a few late turnovers and scoring eight points in the final 2 minutes and 47 seconds.Also Read: Dallas Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg joins legendary Kobe Bryant's elite club after first win of 2025-26 season
Article Summary: Dallas mavericks‚Äô star rookie cooper flagg creates a rare nba record against the los angeles clippers. The mavericks star rookie went on to secure 35 points after defeating the clippers in a recent game. Lebron james is the only other 18-year-old to score 35 points in an nba game. He did it twice as a rookie in december 2023.

Article Title: Kobe Bryant's wife Vanessa Bryant turns Disneyland into family adventure as her daughters steal the spotlight
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant with her daughters (Image via AP)

Vanessa Bryant gives a sneak peek of Disneyland outing with her daughters on Instagram

Vanessa Bryant has been there for her daughters like a rock after Kobe Bryant . Whether its about supporting their dreams or attending their favorite music star‚Äôs concert, the popular philanthropist has been there like a rock for her lovely daughters. Vanessa Bryant recently shared a glimpse of a fun time with her daughters Natalia, Bianka, and Capri all the way from Disneyland on Instagram.The comment section of the clip shared by Vanessa Bryant was flocked with lovely comments from her fans and followers. According to the posted clip, Vanessa and her daughters were spotted enjoying themselves a lot at Disneyland.Kobe Bryant‚Äôs wife, Vanessa Bryant recently shared a glimpse of funtime at Disneyland with her daughters Natalia, Bianka and Capri. The clip clearly showed the Bryant girls enjoying during a family adventure at Disneyland. Over the years, Vanessa has played the role if both mother and a father very efficiently in the absence of Kobe Bryant.Vanessa Bryant has been quite vocal when it comes to talking about her daughters. During an exclusive interview with People, she poured her heart out while talking about her older daughter, Natalia. Vanessa said,"I'm extremely proud of Natalia, my right-hand woman. On top of her own grief, she has balanced her senior year of high school, applying to colleges, nurturing her sisters, and just recently signing her own modeling contract with IMG.She is a wonderful big sister and an incredible daughter."She further elaborated,‚ÄúSometimes she can't hide her sadness from the kids. My eyes and pain can't be filtered in person. They know Mommy has hard days, but when I see their faces when they realize that I've been crying, it makes me straighten up and push through for them. I counter it with making them smile about something. Always finding the light in darkness."Vanessa Bryant says her four daughters are ‚Äústrong, resilient, respectful, and kind,‚Äù and she‚Äôs deeply proud of them. She adds that if she were growing up alongside them, they‚Äôre the kind of people she would hope to become. After the tragic helicopter crash that killed Kobe Bryant and daughter Gianna, Vanessa has stood by her daughters like a rock. She recently paid tribute to Kobe Bryant's fans by launching a photobook Mamba and Mambacita and went on to make more than 100 murals immortal beyond a lifetime.Also Read: Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs family outing steals the spotlight as Los Angeles Dodgers fall short against Toronto Blue Jays in Game 5
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant recently shared a glimpse of a fun time with her daughters natalia, bianka, and capri. The clip clearly showed the bryant girls enjoying during a family adventure at disneyland. Over the years, vanessa has played the role if both mother and a father very efficiently.

Article Title: Will Justin Herbert play against the Las Vegas Raiders today? Latest injury update on the popular Los Angeles Chargers quarterback
Article Text:
All eyes are on Justin Herbert.(Image via Harry How/Getty)

Is the Los Angeles Chargers‚Äô star player, Justin Herbert, taking the field against the Las Vegas Raiders today?





Justin Herbert‚Äôs injury update as the Los Angeles Chargers‚Äô head coach opens up about him





The Los Angeles Chargers have recorded a pretty average run on the field in the new season, as the team has lost four out of the eleven matches played so far.In the last five matches, the Los Angeles Chargers have just won twice while brutally losing against the Tennessee Titans, the Jacksonville Jaguars and the Indianapolis Colts. As the team gears up to face the Las Vegas Raiders today, all eyes are on the team‚Äôs star player, Justin Herbert.Yes, the Los Angeles Chargers‚Äô popular quarterback, Justin Herbert, is all set to face the Las Vegas Raiders today at SoFi Stadium, Inglewood.At this point in time, the Los Angeles Chargers‚Äô injury report does not feature Justin Herbert and it seems he is fully fit for today‚Äôs game.The Los Angeles Chargers have ruled out running back Omarion Hampton from today‚Äôs game while Otito Ogbonnia‚Äôs availability is questionable.A few weeks ago, the Los Angeles Chargers‚Äô quarterback sustained an ankle injury in the match against the Pittsburgh Steelers.While fans were concerned about his recovery, he seems fully fit and focused on the new season.A few days ago, the Los Angeles Chargers‚Äô head coach Jim Harbaugh opened up about Justin Herbert and said, Enjoy it. He‚Äôs not only one of the best in the game currently, he‚Äôs one of the best of all-time.I do not feel at all like I‚Äôm going out on a limb in saying that. ... Everything you could say good about a quarterback and then some. Talent and effort, and just intangibles that are off the chart.‚ÄùThe Los Angeles Chargers‚Äô head coach added, ‚ÄúEvery measurement you could have for a quarterback, tangible or intangible, he possesses at the highest level. It‚Äôs like being around greatness every day.‚ÄùThe exciting match between the Los Angeles Chargers and the Las Vegas Raiders is all set to begin at 4:25pm ET in SoFi Stadium.Viewers can tune into CBS to watch the exciting match or livestream the match on Fubo and Paramount+.Also Read: ‚ÄúI‚Äôve sunk into a dark hole‚Äù: Marshawn Kneeland‚Äôs pregnant girlfriend Catalina Mancera admits she is struggling to cope after his passing

Article Title: NHL Update: Will Rangers star forward Artemi Panarin play tonight against the Boston Bruins?
Article Text:
Artemi Panarin of the New York Rangers looks on during the first period of a game against the Utah Mammoth (Credit: Getty Images)

Rangers' Artemi Panarin Breaks Through With First Home Goal Of Season

Artemi Panarin's playing status in Boston Bruins at New York Rangers



The New York Rangers will take on the Boston Bruins tonight. All in what promises to be an intense NHL match. Both teams boast skilled forwards and tight defensive lines. The game at TD Garden is expected to deliver high-energy action. Rangers star Artemi Panarin has been central to New York‚Äôs scoring this season. And his presence on the ice could heavily influence the outcome.Boston Bruins forward David Pastrnak will lead the home team, aiming to exploit any gaps in the Rangers‚Äô defense. Both teams have been involved in high-scoring games recently, which could make tonight‚Äôs matchup an exciting contest for fans and bettors following NHL news updates. The puck drops at 1 p.m. ET, and the game will be broadcast live on TNT.The Rangers have relied on Artemi Panarin for consistent offensive production this season. In 25 games, Panarin has recorded 7 goals and 15 assists, totaling 22 points. And, ranking among the team‚Äôs top scorers. With his ability to create plays and contribute in crucial moments. Panarin‚Äôs participation tonight could be a decisive factor against a strong Bruins team.New York has scored 64 goals this season, averaging 2.6 goals per game, while conceding 65. Boston, meanwhile, has tallied 77 goals, ranking sixth in the league, but has allowed 78, making its defense a potential target for Panarin and his line. Betting insights indicate the matchup could go over the projected 5.5 goals, given both teams‚Äô scoring trends and recent games.In addition to Panarin, Adam Fox and Mika Zibanejad will be key contributors. That too, for the Rangers. On the Bruins‚Äô side, Pastrnak and Morgan Geekie are expected to push.All the pace and create scoring chances. Fans and analysts will be watching Panarin‚Äôs ice time. And, special teams‚Äô performance and in-game contributions are closely tied to predict the outcome of this crucial NHL match today.Also Read: NHL updates: Heartbreaking week for Boston Bruins‚Äô Charlie McAvoy as his wife Kiley shares emotional family update
Article Summary: The new york rangers take on the boston bruins at td garden tonight. The puck drops at 1 p.m. Et, and the game will be broadcast live on tnt. Rangers star artemi panarin has been central to new york‚Äôs scoring this season.

Article Title: Track and field couple Sha‚ÄôCarri Richardson and Christian Coleman trade drills for dancing as coach grants special day off for Thanksgiving
Article Text:
Sha‚ÄôCarri Richardson and Christian Coleman (via Getty Images)

Coach Dennis Mitchell gives athletes Sha‚ÄôCarri Richardson and Christian Coleman a rare break for Thanksgiving

Christian Coleman's instagram story for thanksgiving 2025

Sha‚ÄôCarri Richardson and Christian Coleman were seen celebrating Thanksgiving with fellow athletes after their coach announced a rare break from training. The sprint stars are currently in their off-season, but continue to train together in Florida. After months of intense work, the couple and their teammates finally got time to relax and enjoy the holiday. Christian Coleman shared the snaps from the day off on his Instagram stories, which quickly went viral.Notably, both athletes last competed at the 2025 World Athletics Championships in Tokyo in September. Richardson brought home gold in the women‚Äôs 4x100m relay. Coleman also claimed gold in the same event in the men‚Äôs category. Despite their recent success, they returned straight to training. This Thanksgiving break must have offered a brief pause amid their strict routine.Sha‚ÄôCarri Richardson and Christian Coleman train under former Olympic sprinter Dennis Mitchell at the Star Athletics Track Club in Florida. Under his guidance, both athletes have stayed active even during the off-season.Following the day-off announcement, Christian Coleman shared a short video on social media.The clip showed Richardson and other athletes dancing and celebrating.Notably, Richardson and Coleman made their relationship public in 2024. They first appeared together at the USATF Night of Legends during the USATF Wings Awards and Athlete of the Year Awards.Earlier this year, the couple faced a difficult moment. Sha‚ÄôCarri Richardson was arrested before the 2025 USATF Championships for allegedly assaulting Coleman at the Seattle-Tacoma International Airport. CCTV footage showed Richardson following Coleman as he tried to walk away. The video also showed her bumping into him and throwing a headphone at him during the argument.Days after the incident, Richardson issued a public apology and expressed her feelings. ‚ÄúI apologize to Christian. He came into my life & gave me more than a relationship but a greater understanding of unconditional love from what I‚Äôve experienced in my past. Due to my past trauma and pain, I was blind and blocked off to not only receive it but also give it. I love him, and to him I can‚Äôt apologize enough. My apology should be as loud as my actions, honestly louder‚Äù, Sha‚ÄôCarri Richardson expressed, via CNN Sports.Christian Coleman later forgave Richardson and stood by her during the difficult period. Their shared Thanksgiving celebration now signals a calmer phase in their relationship as they prepare for the next chapter of their careers.Also Read: Olympics champion Sha‚ÄôCarri Richardson reveals how the ‚Äústrong black women‚Äù in her family shaped her journey
Article Summary: Sha‚Äôcarri richardson and christian coleman were seen celebrating thanksgiving with fellow athletes after their coach announced a rare break from training. Christian coleman shared the snaps from the day off on his instagram stories, which quickly went viral. The sprint stars are currently in their off-season, but continue to train together in florida.

Article Title: New pic emerges as biological male Jammie Booker is stripped of Strongest Woman title and rivals call the athlete arrogant and talking trash
Article Text:
New pic emerges as biological male Jammie Booker is stripped of Strongest Woman title and rivals call the athlete arrogant and talking trash (Image via Getty)

What Hailey Sikman and Jade Dickens said about Jammie Booker at the Texas event



Jammie Booker, 28, lost her World‚Äôs Strongest Woman title after officials said she is a biological male and also after explicit photos spread during the event. This happened at the 2025 contest in Arlington, Texas, last weekend. On Tuesday, the Official Strongman Games said they removed her win because they only allow people to compete in the category of the sex marked at birth. This pushed Andrea Thompson , 43, from Great Britain, into first place.Rivals told the Daily Mail and Fox News Digital that they only learned about Booker‚Äôs gender after the event. They said the photos and videos were sent to them later. One photo showed Booker grabbing her chest and sticking out her tongue. The Daily Mail also said competitors shared adult pictures and videos that seemed to show Booker had worked in porn. Because of this, the event became a huge controversy.Strongwomen Hailey Sikman and Jade Dickens said they felt ‚Äúconned‚Äù because they did not know anything about Jammie Booker‚Äôs gender before the contest ended. Jade Dickens told Fox News Digital that she was ‚Äúbeyond mad.‚Äù She said, ‚ÄúNobody knew he was a man.‚ÄùShe also said Booker was quiet, and she believed Booker‚Äôs voice might have revealed the truth.Hailey Sikman said she tried to talk to Booker during the event, but Booker did not respond. Sikman said many women felt Jammie Booker was ‚Äúarrogant‚Äù and ‚Äútalking s***.‚Äù They believed she kept a distance from other athletes.On Tuesday, the Official Strongman Games shared a strong statement. They said, ‚ÄúIt appears that an athlete who is biologically male and who now identifies as female competed in the Women‚Äôs Open category.‚Äù They also said they tried to contact Booker but did not get a reply.The Daily Mail looked into claims that Booker worked in adult entertainment. Their report said Booker looks like a porn performer named Jammie Jay, and Booker also uses the TikTok name @jammiejaysvids. The IAFD (Internet Adult Film Database) shows that ‚ÄúJammie Jay‚Äù was nominated at the Trans Erotica Awards in 2020 and 2022. The site also lists several adult movie titles under that name.The Daily Mail reached out to Booker and her coach but got no response. They also contacted the Official Strongman Games to ask if these photos and videos were part of the decision to remove the title.In a 2017 YouTube video, Jammie Booker said she was a ‚Äú21-year-old trans woman‚Äù with a hard past and strict parents. In a July podcast with champion strongwoman Erin Murray, Booker talked about having three partners and said she uses Google Calendar to plan time with each one.She said she trains early in the morning and keeps her schedule tight so she can balance work, partners, and strongwoman training.Also Read: Why Did A Biological Male Win The World‚Äôs Strongest Woman? Andrea Thompson Makes Her Three Word Protest As Jammie Booker Takes Gold
Article Summary: Jammie booker, 28, lost her world‚Äôs strongest woman title after officials said she is a biological male and also after explicit photos spread during the event. On tuesday, the official strongman games said they removed her win because they only allow people to compete in the category of the sex marked at birth.

Article Title: NHL Update: Marcus Foligno placed on injured reserve, will miss upcoming games for Minnesota Wild
Article Text:
Marcus Foligno (Image Via Twitter)

How will Marcus Foligno‚Äôs injury affect Minnesota‚Äôs Wild lineup?

Marcus Foligno (#17) All 23 Goals of the 2021-22 NHL Season

The veteran winger Marcus Foligno has been placed on injured reserve by the Minnesota Wild effective November 26, after he picked up a lower-body injury in the course of the game against the Chicago Blackhawks, which went into overtime on Wednesday night. Foligno was involved in a collision with Oliver Moore and had to leave the match late in the second period, and the Wild has since called up Nicolas Aub√©-Kubel from their AHL affiliate in Iowa to take his place on the roster. Minnesota is currently without five forwards, including Ryan Hartman, Vinnie Hinostroza, Marco Rossi, and Vladimir Tarasenko, while they have approximately $3.43 million in cap space.Foligno will be out for the next three games at least and can only return as early as December 4 against the Calgary Flames. This winger, who is 34 years old, has not been very productive offensively in recent times, getting only two assists in 23 games, and his average ice time of 13:07 is the lowest in the last seven years. Nevertheless, he still plays a vital defensive role, and numbers like expected goals against per 60 minutes (2.63) and scoring chances against per 60 (28.29) show that he is worth having in his own zone.The Wild have to deal with the problem of performing up to standard while the crucial forwards are out of the lineup.The head coach, John Hynes, has not given any specific time frame for Marcus Foligno‚Äôs full recovery, so Minnesota has to cope with using its depth players, together with recalled Aub√©-Kubel, to keep its lineup alive.Foligno's IR placement is very timely as the team is poised to extend its winning streak to six and fortify its Central Division position. The Wild will have to make extensive ice time adjustments, change line combinations, and rethink deployment strategies to remain competitive during his absence.Foligno's injury puts additional strain on the Minnesota forwards; however, good roster management and the help from the fit players are going to be the key factors in getting through the upcoming fixtures.Also Read: NHL Updates: Montreal Canadiens re-sign defenseman Mike Matheson to a long-term extension
Article Summary: Marcus foligno has been placed on injured reserve by the minnesota wild. The veteran winger picked up a lower-body injury in the course of the game against the chicago blackhawks, which went into overtime on wednesday night. Minnesota is currently without five forwards, including ryan hartman, vinnie hinostroza, marco rossi, and vladimir tarasenko.

Article Title: Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight vs the Chicago Bulls? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (November 28, 2025)
Article Text:
LaMelo Ball of Charlotte Hornets (Image via NBA)

Charlotte Hornets

LaMelo Ball being fully available

LaMelo Ball's Injury Report vs the Chicago Bulls (November 28, 2025)

Chicago Bulls Injury Report vs the Charlotte Hornets (November 28, 2025)

Theenter their NBA Cup showdown against the Chicago Bulls on November 28, 2025, with renewed energy, thanks to. Tip-off is set for 7:30 PM ET, and for the first time in a while, Charlotte‚Äôs star point guard walks into a matchup without an injury tag shadowing him. His clean bill of health is reassuring for a fanbase that has watched him battle ankle concerns all season.Charlotte is desperate for stability, especially with their record slipping further below .500. Having Ball at the helm offers something this team has lacked in recent weeks: direction. And considering the Bulls are arriving with a battered roster and numerous rotational uncertainties, the Hornets know this is a prime opportunity to regain momentum. With Black Friday bringing a national spotlight to the tournament slate, the timing couldn‚Äôt be better.LaMelo Ball enters tonight‚Äôs contest after logging 27 minutes in Wednesday‚Äôs outing against the Knicks, where he posted 11 points, six rebounds, and four assists. Despite a rough 4-for-14 shooting night, his presence alone boosted Charlotte‚Äôs tempo and spacing. Even as whispers of ongoing ankle management persist, the official injury report listed him as fully available.That clarity allows the Hornets to lean on his signature dynamism - no-look passes, deep-range orchestration, and paint manipulation.This comes after a turbulent stretch in which Ball missed significant time due to a right ankle impingement. His return has been gradual, but the recent uptick in minutes shows that the team is confident in his durability. With Brandon Miller also cleared, Charlotte‚Äôs offensive engine finally resembles what it was designed to be earlier this season. Still, Hornets fans understand how quickly fortunes can shift if Ball tweaks the ankle again.Chicago enters Spectrum Center in disarray. The Bulls are dealing with an injury avalanche headlined by Zach Collins, who remains out with a left scaphoid fracture, and Isaac Okoro, listed as doubtful due to lumbar radiculopathy. Several others are questionable: Nikola Vucevic (knee), Coby White (calf/injury management), Patrick Williams (wrist), Kevin Huerter (pelvic contusion), and Dalen Terry (calf). In total, the Bulls could be missing up to seven rotation players.Also read: Is Joel Embiid playing tonight vs the Brooklyn Nets? Latest update on the Philadelphia 76ers star‚Äôs injury report (November 28, 2025) Meanwhile, Charlotte‚Äôs own absences - Pat Connaughton (calf), Josh Green (shoulder), and Grant Williams (knee) - are comparatively manageable. Given the Bulls‚Äô depth concerns, the Hornets have an opportunity to control pace, dictate matchups, and punish mismatches on both ends.
Article Summary: Charlotte hornets host chicago bulls in nba cup on november 28, 2025. Lamelo ball is fully available for the hornets, despite ongoing ankle concerns. The bulls are dealing with a number of injuries, including zach collins and isaac okoro.

Article Title: Who is Myles Garrett‚Äôs girlfriend Chloe Kim? The Olympic icon behind the NFL star‚Äôs new romance
Article Text:
Cleveland Browns star Myles Garrett and Olympic snowboarding champion Chloe Kim have confirmed their relationship, sparking fan interest. Kim, a two-time gold medalist, is celebrated for her talent and authentic personality. Their union highlights a rare, genuine support between elite athletes in different sports, with both pursuing their respective careers with mutual admiration.

A look at Chloe Kim‚Äôs life, accomplishments, and the relationship dynamic with Myles Garrett

For months, NFL fans and Olympic followers speculated whether Myles Garrett had finally found someone who could match his competitive fire and now the answer is very clear. The Cleveland Browns superstar and two-time Olympic gold medalist Chloe Kim have gone public, sealing their relationship with a sweet kiss caught on video during the Browns‚Äô Nov. 25 game.But beyond the affectionate moment and the cameras, fans really want to know: who exactly is Chloe Kim, the woman capturing the heart of one of the NFL‚Äôs most dominant defensive players? Far from being just a supportive girlfriend in the stands, Chloe is a global sports powerhouse with her own legacy, molded by talent, cultural impact, and a fiercely authentic personality.Chloe Kim isn‚Äôt simply ‚Äúthe athlete dating an NFL player‚Äù, she‚Äôs one of the most celebrated female Olympians of her generation. A Southern California native, Chloe became the youngest woman to ever win Olympic halfpipe gold at just 17, and later added a second gold medal to her name, cementing herself as a snowboarding legend. Her grounded personality, humility, and witty online presence, like her playful ‚Äúrawr XD. ‚Äù Instagram caption, have made her beloved among Gen Z fans..What's particularly compelling about the Chloe Kim and Myles Garrett pairing is that both are elite athletes in completely different worlds.Myles just broke his single-season sack record, and Chloe is currently preparing to compete in the 2026 Winter Olympics. Instead of existing in competitive tension, their careers seem to complement one another.Chloe has spoken about how gaming helps her reconnect with her inner child and keep stress in check, noting, ‚ÄúI think having a love for gaming is everything to me‚Ä¶‚Äù and adding, ‚Äúeven my boyfriend, he‚Äôs so good at video games.‚Äù That playful intimacy combined with mutual respect is exactly why the relationship resonates with fans..It‚Äôs rare to see two high-profile athletes at the peak of their careers so genuinely supportive of each other, publicly yet authentically. As Chloe heads toward Italy for Olympic competition and Myles Garrett continues his pursuit of NFL greatness, this relationship feels rooted not in spotlight, not in hype, but in admiration and shared joy.Also Read: Aaron Rodgers‚Äô secret marriage mystery grows louder as even family admits they‚Äôve never met his wife
Article Summary: Cleveland browns star myles garrett and olympic snowboarding champion chloe kim have confirmed their relationship. Kim, a two-time gold medalist, is celebrated for her talent and authentic personality. Their union highlights a rare, genuine support between elite athletes in different sports.

Article Title: Utah Mammoth captain Clayton Keller chooses to play after his father‚Äôs death, showing strength in difficult times
Article Text:
Utah Mammoth captain Clayton Keller chooses to play after his father‚Äôs death (Image Via Twitter)

Coach Tourigny supports Clayton Keller during an extremely difficult time

Clayton Keller is going through one of the hardest times of his life, but the captain of the Utah Mammoth, who just lost his father, Bryan Keller, has decided to go on the ice the very next day. The matchup against the Dallas Stars is emotional for Keller, who is a 27-year-old star forward, but it is also a decision based on loyalty and his inner strength. Keller, who has already scored 21 points in 24 games this season, has always been the emotional support for the Mammoth, and his decision to play shows both his commitment to the team and the ties he has with his father.The word came out very fast and left the team in shock. Keller's father died unexpectedly in his sleep, and it was an extremely deep sorrow for the whole Keller family. But Keller was firm that he did not want to leave his mates and, at the same time, he wanted to pay tribute to his father by continuing to play. This very difficult case has only added to the aura of the player who is famous for his leadership, coolness, and grit. Thus, he becomes a greater being in the eyes of the league and the locker room.Utah Mammoth coach Andre Tourigny, who became the organization‚Äôs spokesperson on Friday, was also the one to give a really touching speech that mainly stressed Keller and his family.Tourigny pointed out that the team's first concern is to support their captain in the midst of his great loss. He emphasized over and over that no words can truly express the suffering Keller is undergoing, but that presence and loyalty are the most important things. Tourigny says, ‚ÄúClayton wants to play and be with the team‚Äù and that the Mammoth will be there for him in every way they can.Tourigny pointed out that the real loyalty is revealed during the hardship, stressing that the Mammoth consider themselves a family first and a hockey team second. His communication clarified that the whole organization is together with Keller, honoring his choice and at the same time making sure that he gets the support he needs.During a period characterized by sorrow, Keller‚Äôs decision to go on and Tourigny‚Äôs calm direction reflect the strong trust and bond that exists in the Mammoth organization.Also Read: NHL Updates: Marcus Foligno placed on injured reserve, will miss upcoming games for Minnesota Wild
Article Summary: Utah mammoth captain clayton keller chooses to play after his father‚Äôs death. Keller's father died unexpectedly in his sleep, and it was an extremely deep sorrow for the whole keller family. The 27-year-old star forward has already scored 21 points in 24 games this season.

Article Title: Belgium edge India 1-0 to lift maiden Sultan Azlan Shah Cup in thrilling final
Article Text:
Belgium beat India 1-0. (X Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll How would you rate the overall performance of Indian team in the tournament? Outstanding Good Average Below expectations

Belgium clinched their first-ever Sultan Azlan Shah Cup title after outlasting India 1-0 in a gripping, tactical final in Ipoh on Sunday. Thibeau Stockbroekx scored the decisive goal in the 34th minute, handing the European giants their maiden crown in just their second appearance in the prestigious tournament.India, fresh off a commanding 14-3 demolition of Canada in their previous outing, entered the final with confidence ‚Äî but Belgium‚Äôs discipline, structure and defensive steel proved too difficult to breach. India‚Äôs three penalty corners, usually a strength for drag-flickers Jugraj Singh, Amit Rohidas and Sanjay, went unused against a compact Belgian defensive wall.This was India‚Äôs second loss to Belgium in the tournament, after a narrow 2-3 defeat in the league stage.The final began with Belgium asserting early control through superior ball possession and sharp attacks down the flanks, forcing Indian goalkeeper Suraj Karkera into a couple of strong saves. With senior players Manpreet Singh and Hardik Singh rested for the tournament, India‚Äôs younger midfield worked hard to maintain parity in intense central battles.Although Belgium earned two early penalty corners, India defended well to keep the scoreline level. The match remained goalless at half-time, but the momentum swung decisively Belgium‚Äôs way in the third quarter. Stockbroekx‚Äôs strike ‚Äî off a well-constructed move ‚Äî pushed India on the back foot and increased the pressure.India responded by pressing higher and increasing circle entries, but Belgium‚Äôs organised defence held firm. The final quarter saw the Indians push desperately for an equaliser, but the Belgian structure absorbed wave after wave of attack, smartly running down the clock to seal the championship.For India, the silver medal marks a promising tournament featuring some bright performances from the next generation.
Article Summary: Belgium beat india 1-0 in the sultan azlan shah cup final. Thibeau stockbroekx scored the decisive goal in the 34th minute. It was belgium's first-ever title in just their second appearance in the prestigious tournament.
